title: 本地大學生集體抄功課 3

replies.msg:
鑑於討論太混亂 好多人冇睇前面就回覆
本人決定整合一下各位巴打既留言方便討論
先利申本人唔係佢學生
from英雄見參巴打(not CU student)

我認為有必要mark底啲coincidence
因為我真係好感動
估唔到人生在世係有咁多coincidence

Coincidence1: 40多名被指控抄襲者皆為local
(佢自己講嘅，居然一個nonlocal都冇，令人誤會佢針對local )
Coincidence2 : local曾經上網屌9個lecturer廢，然後依家HW2 lecturer就捉人啦，捉嘅人皆為local
(令人誤會佢想報復)
Coincidence3:該lecturer嘅note同另一個唔係佢任教course嘅note不約而同地一樣。
(令人誤會佢未問過同事就抄人note)
Coincidence4: 該lecturer嘅assignment同某啲書嘅題目撞左 ，但佢冇落citation
(令人誤會佢抄人諗出嚟嘅題目)
Coincidence5:當連登講起sample時，真係搞左份抄襲sample，可惜樣本太少，而且是否抄襲值得商榷，大部分人主觀認為唔係抄。
(令人誤會佢係mon post 狗)
Coincidence6:遲遲唔公開全部sample，透明度低。
（令人誤會佢對local nonlocal有不同的指控標準)
Coincidence7: 歧視完local，之後再send email話要amend
（令人誤會佢唔想承認自己歧視)
Coincidence8: 在抄襲sample中，態度好串，卻被網友發現當中有題目的要求不清，嫌疑同學的答案可以算正確。令被他指出抄襲錯誤方法的同學為他感到尷尬
（令人誤會佢係嚟搞笑嘅)

fact abt the lecturer
fact1:直接標籤DSE入中大嘅本地學生抄襲
fact2:寬己嚴人
fact3:態度好串
fact4: discussion如果唔cite 都當抄襲
fact5: 功課唔識唔比問 ,因為唔公平
What can you conclude


事源: https://www.facebook.com/CUHKSecrets/posts/2536331359804297
Lecturer send個份email全文:https:// pasteid.fledix.com/ 5vza (from cu secrets)
文中重點:As we observed, there are many local students (i.e. admitted to CUHK through HKDSE Exams) involving in “suspicious of plagiarism” cases in recent HW 2,
especially for Question 3, 5 and 6, some of these students seem to be too busy in hall and/or society functions.
On the other hand, ALL international (including mainland, Taiwan and Macau) students write up their own answers and explain things in different ways,
I would like to express my utmost appreciation to many of you, who have come up different approaches apart from my personal suggested solution.
直接標籤DSE入中大嘅本地學生抄襲 一個non local 同nds都冇抄

Whenever there is discussion involved during the process, please be reminded that YOU MUST INDICATE A PROPER ACKNOWLEDGMENT at the back of that particular problem,
e.g., I have discussed with Mr. CHAN Tai Man regarding Question 4, otherwise this will be treated as “cheating” or “plagiarism” in academic world.
That’s why many authors of journal articles were being accused for “plagiarism”.
如果唔cite 一律當抄襲
大家以後做數記得落reference F = ma (Newton, 16xx)
同過個fd傾過就(Mr. CHAN Tai Man, 2020)啦
唔係就當抄啦

Moreover, some of you mentioned that due to the previously announced HW policies,
you seem hesitated to seek help from instructors and TAs questions regarding HW assignments.

For all remaining assignments (starting from HW 3 onwards), if you have any queries (e.g., interpretation of questions) or would like to acquire some possible directions to start with a certain problem, feel free to send emails to our TAs at the first stage.
If the TAs cannot solve your problems, please let either Dr. Tsang and I know. We all will try our best to help and provide insights, though we will NOT provide you the solution (which is unfair to other students).
As a part of the teaching team, we all have to uphold the concept of “fairness” within the term.
This is extraordinarily important if you are working in commercial world or involved in government projects in the future.
但係出呢封信之前有咁講過

咁實際上係問得定唔問得呢?佢自己先知

其後有secrets同學反擊:

其後佢唔知發生左咩事出多左一封相同既email
內容相似 有人問我先po
但係刪走哂local同non local個part
係咪出自心虛?

有個會員疑似本人(?)話係佢個FD知道來龍去脈
親身上黎解話
當大家叫佢俾sample既時候

佢就好快出左份野係blackboard度打算串柒班local
但呢份野經過大家分析有好多錯 我係下面再講
於是大家發現佢所講既抄同大家定義既抄有分歧
甚至連個lecturer話抄既答案實際上係岩(佢係以咁岩用錯同一個方法作為理據)
而lecturer個個answer好有可能係錯
以下就可以追故 我慢慢講來龍去脈 亦繼續討論

Follow咗呢單嘢好耐，唔評論佢本人品格點樣，純粹評論下暴大賤數嘅問題同埋佢嘅處理手法。
作為暴大學生，我一直都覺得大部分賤數course都係好失敗，因為唔同course之間內容可以好冇關係，亦都唔會照顧到數學根底差嘅人。可能你會話數學差就唔應該揀賤或者要自己努力上網自學，但係有時候一啲知識經把口去過濾嘅話係真係好好多。而呢個問題暴大一直以嚟都冇解決到，所以賤仔啲數差都唔係第一日嘅事，所以加多科數代替科砌車，我覺得係好事嚟。問題係上個sem嘅course其實係冇完成到，即係班fm係冇完整嘅1510知識就走咗去讀1120同1130，咁樣嘅話變相係仲差過以往嘅情況。
至於Hugo，佢串唔串係咪有心針對local我唔評論，我純粹睇佢嘅處理方法，再心較返我自己遇過嘅lecturer同TA，我會覺得佢個心態未上到一個lecturer嘅地步。我唔排除佢係真心覺得班學生抄功課，但係佢同一個lecturer相比，佢好明顯係冇耐性去睇清楚啲學生嘅錯處就直接send email比啲學生。以前上2420嘅時候個TA又係啲攞best TA award嘅人，把口好串，但係又真係教得唔錯。我冇上過1120或者1130所以唔知佢點教，但係我會覺得Hugo目前嘅言論同個TA其實冇咩分別。
最後想講下某啲學生，不論有冇抄同學份答案都好，做功課個心態係有啲問題。就算hugo點唔俾問都好，上網google完見到似就直接跟住做都唔係一個正確嘅方法，因為咁做法其實學唔到嘢，我寧願漏空佢再之後問，都好過亂咁寫嘢落去又唔明發生咩事。

along y = 0
lim 0 * (x - 0)/(x + 0) = 0
along x = 0

時間表
01.22 拒絕問功課email
"we will NOT provide any comments, feedback and suggestions for any problems in the assigned HW"

01.24 交HW1

01.31~ CU secret 不斷討論ENGG1130

02.02 呢封回應secrect既email
"Therefore, I expect you should spend at least 2 days for writing up the HW solutions before submission."

02.07 交HW2

02.12 CU secret有人話自己被屈plag
"咁唔打都打左咁多字去解釋當然想再爭取下, 點知佢再charge我多一條原本冇charge我嘅, 跟住再比三個選擇我：
1）扣我嗰幾條分 跟住close file
2）再做多份新嘅HW2 限時24個鐘"

02.13 Hugo話local抄襲email
"As we observed, there are many local students (i.e. admitted to CUHK through HKDSE Exams) involving in “suspicious of plagiarism” cases in recent HW 2, especially for Question 3, 5 and 6, some of these students seem to be too busy in hall and/or society functions. On the other hand, ALL international (including mainland, Taiwan and Macau) students write up their own answers and explain things in different ways, I would like to express my utmost appreciation to many of you, who have come up different approaches apart from my personal suggested solution."
"Whenever there is discussion involved during the process, please be reminded that YOU MUST INDICATE A PROPER ACKNOWLEDGMENT at the back of that particular problem, e.g., I have discussed with Mr. CHAN Tai Man regarding Question 4, otherwise this will be treated as “cheating” or “plagiarism” in academic world. That’s why many authors of journal articles were being accused for “plagiarism”."

02.13 6小時後出的amendment email
"Note: I amended this paragraph a bit based on some feedbacks. I have no intention to point at anyone in my previous message, all factual descriptions are solely based on "observations" and "statistical count".

Dear students,

As we observed, there are many students involving in “suspicious of plagiarism” cases in recent HW 2, especially for Question 3, 5 and 6, some of these students mentioned that they did so because they were too busy in hall and/or society functions. I hope you can spend time more "wisely" from now on, and put more focus on your studies. You MUST have to pass this course before graduation.

At the same time, my heartfelt thanks and appreciation to many international students who write up their own answers and explain things in different ways. This is a very nice phenomenon in education."

#CU0420
"Condemnation Letter for the unprofessional manner of Teaching Team ENGG 1130

17 Feb 2020

Dear Prof. Wong,

We want to express our most profound concern towards the recent message stated by MAK Hugo Wai Leung and the Teaching Team of ENGG 1130 regarding the suspicious of plagiarism incident.

According to an email written by MAK Hugo Wai Leung on behalf of Teaching Team of ENGG 1130. The statement ""there are many local students (i.e. admitted to CUHK through HKDSE Exams) involving in 'suspicious of plagiarism' cases in recent HW 2, especially for Question 3, 5 and 6, some of these students seem to be too busy in hall and/or society functions."" (statement 1) that have been made through email to students are demonstrably false, defamatory and constitute interference with personal reputation. Undoubtedly evidence must be present in a case by case manner to accuse an individual who commits plagiarism. Describing a group of students who commit plagiarism by using ""many local students (i.e. admitted to CUHK through HKDSE Exams)"" are vague, which mislead how others evaluate local students who study HKDSE and finish the homework by their own. Those acts constitute interference with their reputation as well as the reputation of the university.

Statement 1 stated above also specifically target local students who not only study HKDSE but also widely concerned about school affair and social movement; apparently, it means hong kong student. The email then stated, ""ALL international (including mainland, Taiwan and Macau) students write up their own answers and explain things in different ways, I would like to express my utmost appreciation to many of you, who have come up different approaches apart from my personal suggested solution."" (statement 2) which show MAK Hugo Wai Leung's appreciation to all international students who write up their own answers. When compared statement 1 and statement 2, MAK Hugo Wai Leung label local students as those who commit plagiarism and international students as those finish their own work. Ostensibly, he distributes the label according to what student's done, but he fails to show his appreciation to the remaining local students who also finish their own work in statement 2. Therefore, the theory MAK Hugo Wai Leung specifically label local student and international students due to work has been done falling apart. It is unnecessary to specifically mention local student and international students if he wants to show his appreciation to student who finish their own work. Unless his intension is to slander local student and it is an act of racist. If it is correct, the charge against local students who commit plagiarism will be questionable.

Despite the fact that MAK Hugo Wai Leung and the Teaching Team of ENGG 1130 continuously fail to provide any evidence to accuse local students for plagiarism, MAK Hugo Wai Leung suggested three ways to solve this situation. First, admit plagiarism did occur and accept mark deduction, no further punishment. Second, finish a new HW2 within 24 hours with mark deduction. Third, present the case to the discipline committee. All three proposals are a loss for local student on time, effort and put their academic honesty in great risk. Consider it is an assignment with lesser weight and to minimize the total loss. Many students remain no choice but to take the first option, even though they did not commit plagiarism. It is ridiculous and unacceptable to force student to admit plagiarism without providing any evidence, suppress them from defending charges by rejecting any evidence provide by student to prove his innocence and fabricate so-called ""Most of the students admitted that they may have referred to others' answers and/or some online sources"" situation, which very likely students' confession are against their will. It is unfair that student is not allowed to defend their behaviour since wrong judgment could be made. These illogical action taken suggest that MAK Hugo Wai Leung and the Teaching Team of ENGG 1130 intentionally targeting local student.

A PowerPoint ""Regarding HW 2 & Selected HW 2 Answers"" release on 14 Feb 2020 by MAK Hugo Wai Leung further suggest the above claim. According to Hugo(2020), three to nine students' solution per question and a description ""WHAT A COINCIDENCE"" has been provided to prove cases of plagiarism involved. It appears MAK Hugo Wai Leung believed that students who produced similar steps or method to approach, therefore accuse students for commit plagiarism. However, if we have some experience with mathematics, it is evident that two irrelevant students can come up with an identical answer. The reason is that mathematics calculation is restricted by a combination of rule and formula, especially when the concept of error occurs, two irrelevant students can still write up the same answer by using the knowledge they have. This is not a coincidence. This is the characteristic of mathematics and the reason we have a common mistakes section in math. Accusing anyone of commit plagiarism in mathematics with similarity is laughable. As stated above, evidences must be present in a case by case basis to accuse an individual who commits plagiarism, which is about another 31 cases (Casio fx-50FH II, 2020). Instead of nine selected cases, to blame a group of approximately 40 students commits plagiarism. As it is ludicrous that we accuse MAK Hugo Wai Leung commit plagiarism due to his teaching assistant commit plagiarism on some of the lecturer notes. Coincidentally, MAK Hugo Wai Leung and the Teaching Team of ENGG 1130 conduct an illogical action once again to accuse local students of committing plagiarism.

What a coincidence that MAK Hugo Wai Leung and the Teaching Team of ENGG 1130, first divide students into local students who commit plagiarism and international students who finish their own work, then force local student to admit plagiarism without providing any evidence and suppress students from defending charges, after that implement an insufficient number of cases to accuse a group of 40 students commits plagiarism, next accuse students of commit plagiarism in mathematics with similarity. The truth is now crystal clear. MAK Hugo Wai Leung and the Teaching Team of ENGG 1130 are intentionally targeting local student, which is an act of racist by using his power as a lecturer to fabricate most of the so-called evidences and inexplicable coincidences. Therefore, it is believed that mostly the charges against local students are false, vicious and malicious. We solemnly condemn the action taken by MAK Hugo Wai Leung and the Teaching Team of ENGG 1130 to defame local student for plagiarism.

We hereby notify and urge you to take prompt action to cease and desist from making or repeating any false and defamatory statements. The statements that have been made by MAK Hugo Wai Leung and the Teaching Team of ENGG 1130 are demonstrably false, defamatory and constitute interference with students' reputation. All local students reserved their right to commence a lawsuit against MAK Hugo Wai Leung and the Teaching Team of ENGG 1130 as well as the agency they represent which is The Chinese University of Hong Kong (CUHK) to stop continued false and defamatory, be advised that students can seek recovery of all the loss on their reputation.

As a member of the university, we hope that the standoff will not come true. Therefore, we would like to recommend the university to take the following action to resolve this deadlock.

1. Withdraw any accusation and punishment made by MAK Hugo Wai Leung and the Teaching Team of ENGG 1130

2. Promise not to bring any charges against all students about plagiarism

3. Reinstate the reputation of all local students publicly

4. Establish public hearings regarding the ethics of MAK Hugo Wai Leung and the Teaching Team of ENGG 1130.

5. Consider the relationship between Teaching Team ENGG 1130 and all local students. Special arrangement should be provided on the assessment of students' academic performance due to insufficient trust.

Only if we uphold a spirit of unity and work hand in hand to pursue our mission and identify innovative solutions can help everyone to defeat this challenge. #CU0420
"Condemnation Letter for the unprofessional manner of Teaching Team ENGG 1130

17 Feb 2020

Dear Prof. Wong,

We want to express our most profound concern towards the recent message stated by MAK Hugo Wai Leung and the Teaching Team of ENGG 1130 regarding the suspicious of plagiarism incident.

According to an email written by MAK Hugo Wai Leung on behalf of Teaching Team of ENGG 1130. The statement ""there are many local students (i.e. admitted to CUHK through HKDSE Exams) involving in 'suspicious of plagiarism' cases in recent HW 2, especially for Question 3, 5 and 6, some of these students seem to be too busy in hall and/or society functions."" (statement 1) that have been made through email to students are demonstrably false, defamatory and constitute interference with personal reputation. Undoubtedly evidence must be present in a case by case manner to accuse an individual who commits plagiarism. Describing a group of students who commit plagiarism by using ""many local students (i.e. admitted to CUHK through HKDSE Exams)"" are vague, which mislead how others evaluate local students who study HKDSE and finish the homework by their own. Those acts constitute interference with their reputation as well as the reputation of the university.

Statement 1 stated above also specifically target local students who not only study HKDSE but also widely concerned about school affair and social movement; apparently, it means hong kong student. The email then stated, ""ALL international (including mainland, Taiwan and Macau) students write up their own answers and explain things in different ways, I would like to express my utmost appreciation to many of you, who have come up different approaches apart from my personal suggested solution."" (statement 2) which show MAK Hugo Wai Leung's appreciation to all international students who write up their own answers. When compared statement 1 and statement 2, MAK Hugo Wai Leung label local students as those who commit plagiarism and international students as those finish their own work. Ostensibly, he distributes the label according to what student's done, but he fails to show his appreciation to the remaining local students who also finish their own work in statement 2. Therefore, the theory MAK Hugo Wai Leung specifically label local student and international students due to work has been done falling apart. It is unnecessary to specifically mention local student and international students if he wants to show his appreciation to student who finish their own work. Unless his intension is to slander local student and it is an act of racist. If it is correct, the charge against local students who commit plagiarism will be questionable.
